description:
From 2 skillet meals, to stews, to Dutch oven recipes, this set can give your menu some serious range. No matter how you choose to use the Combo Cooker, its versatility makes it a valuable addition to the camp kitchen and the home kitchen. Lodge has been making cast iron cookware since 1896. Their natural pre-seasoning and rust inhibiting heat-treating are few reasons why they're still a market leader.

  • Includes 1 skillet and 1 deep skillet, these work together as a Dutch oven
  • Pre-seasoned with 100% natural vegetable oil, providing a durable finish that gets better with use
  • Heirloom quality cast iron works over open flames, in oven or on a stovetop
  • Heavy-base and precise wall thickness ensures even heat
  • Heat-treated to reduce rust and improve surface finish
  • Lodge’s US foundry uses induction furnaces, reducing their cast iron’s carbon footprint
  • Dimensions, deep skillet: 42 x 26.7 x 7.8cm, skillet: 42 x 26.7 x 4cm
name: Lodge Combo Cooker
